appetizers.name: Gaucamole and tortilla chips
appetizers.description: Avocado, cilantro, lime juice and freshly fried tortilla chips

appetizers.name: SPICY TUNA SASHIMI
appetizers.description: raw yellowfin tuna, garlic, jalapeno, cilantro & yuzu ponzu

appetizers.name: CRISPY MUSHROOMS
appetizers.description: oyster and honey mushrooms battered and fried served with a citrus infused aioli

appetizers.name: TRUFFLE FRITES
appetizers.description: Parmesan, truffle oil, triple cooked frites & truffle mayo

appetizers.name: COCONUT SEA BASS C E V I C H E
appetizers.description: fresh sea bass cured in lime juice mixed with jalapeno, red onion, mango and avocado- served with taro chips

appetizers.name: FRITTO MISTO
appetizers.description: fried calamari, shrimp, atlantic cod, jalapeno and onion with fresh lemon & spicy calabrese dip

appetizers.name: STEAK TARTARE
appetizers.description: beef tenderloin, dijon mustard, shallots, quails egg chives, baby gem lettuce, grilled focaccia

appetizers.name: FRIED CHICKEN
appetizers.description: crispy fried chicken tenders served with bibb lettuce, house pickled cucumber, accompanied with a hot honey and dill ranch sauce

appetizers.name: Strawberry champagne cheesecake
appetizers.description: vanilla cheesecake marbled with strawberry baked atop a chocolate cookie graham
